title: Analyze Referral Traffic Sources
description: A social media editor wants to know which platform (Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, etc.) is driving the most traffic to the website.

tasks.description: Open the web analytics platform and navigate to the 'Acquisition' or 'Referral Traffic' report.
Set the date range for the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is filtered for the correct time period.

tasks.description: Analyze the report to identify the top 5 social media referral sources by number of sessions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ranked list of the most effective social platforms for driving traffic.
